meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dowdy.
meanings.sent1: Her dowdiness was evident in her outdated clothing.
meanings.sent2: The dowdiness of her outfit made her stand out in a negative way.
meanings.sent3: Despite her dowdiness, she always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with a sense of dowdiness, like a forgotten attic.
meanings.sent5: The dowdiness of the old house gave it a cozy, lived-in feel.

meanings.definition: The appearance or dress of a dowdy person.
meanings.sent1: She tried to hide her dowdiness with bright accessories.
meanings.sent2: His dowdiness was a stark contrast to the stylish crowd around him.
meanings.sent3: The dowdiness of his outfit was unintentionally comical.
meanings.sent4: Her dowdiness was like a cloak of invisibility in the fashion-forward crowd.
meanings.sent5: The dowdiness of his appearance seemed to belong to another era.
